sentences.english: Drug addiction, drug selling and other illegal acts are also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 严禁吸毒贩毒和其他违法行为。

sentences.english: The regulations also ban unregulated health practitioners from commissioning or formulating their own medicines.
sentences.chinese: 法规还严禁不合格的中医医生从业或配制自己的药方。

sentences.english: No friends or relatives are allowance to your employer's house or let them stay overnight.
sentences.chinese: 雇主严禁你带朋友或亲属到雇主屋企或让她们过夜。

sentences.english: Strictly prohibit landlords and rich peasants from sneaking into the peasant associations and poor peasant leagues.
sentences.chinese: 严禁地主富农分子混入农民协会和贫农团。

sentences.english: You are forbidden from smoking in the concert hall.
sentences.chinese: 严禁你在演奏厅内吸烟。

sentences.english: Do not clean the waterborne lacquer of the spray gun with the oily lacquer cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 严禁用油性漆清洁剂清洗水性漆喷枪。

sentences.english: Here is not allowed to post any Blood-and-thunder picture.

sentences.english: People just having taken alcohol are declined. No smoking after taking seat.

sentences.english: This video is for home use only.
sentences.chinese: 此影片为家用版，严禁公开播放。

sentences.english: No smoking and using fire directly in the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 车间内严禁吸烟和用明火作业。

sentences.english: It is prohibited delivering explosives and detonators in same wagon.
sentences.chinese: 炸药和雷管严禁同车运送。

sentences.english: To be uncomfortably tight or restricting, as clothes.
sentences.chinese: 日常严禁穿著紧身，过薄或暴露之衣服。

sentences.english: Abide operation regulation, forbid peccant operation.
sentences.chinese: 遵守操作规程，严禁违章操作。

sentences.english: Ascend the wave son to strictly forbid in to cause disturbance wildly for the and calumniate without restraint.

definition: must not/may not/not to be allowed/cannot
must/to need to/to be sure to
not having undergone/without (having gone though a certain process)
to take strict precautions/on your guard
